org.xbib.marc

Class MarcGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.MarcGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChunkListener<byte[],BytesReference>

    public class MarcGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChunkListener<byte[],BytesReference>
    This chunk listener interprets the chunks from a stream and generates MARC events to a given MARC listener.
